product_name: Union Channel M6 Conversion Disc Kit
long_description: The Union Channel M6 Conversion Disc Kit allows your Union bindings to be compatible with 2011 The Channel M6 boards from Burton. Adaptor discs convert Union bindings to the Channel M6 snowboard mounting system.
short_description: The Union Channel M6 Conversion Disc Kit allows your Union bindings to be compatible with 2011 The Channel M6 boards from Burton.
